channel.title: [317] Open The Client and then takes you to your website Newest
channel.description:
The Old Topic Here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html[/url] Is a Error Its Works But your RUN File Is Going You cant run The Client My Version ;) Right Click On The "Run" File And you will see this code
@ECHO OFF color 81 title Your Server Name Here Client echo Your Server Name Here Client echo Made by Your Name Here JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
Change it To this
@ECHO OFF color 81 title Your Server Name Here Client start http://YourWebsite.Com" echo Your Server Name Here Client echo Made by Your Name Here JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
By Owner Kevin And This Topic [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html[/url]

item.title: [317] Open The Client and then takes you to your website Newest
item.dc:creator: @lordy570 lordy570
item.description:
@lordy570 wrote:

The Old Topic Here
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html
Is a Error Its Works But your RUN File Is Going You cant run The Client
My Version

Right Click On The “Run” File And you will see this code

@ECHO OFF color 81 title Your Server Name Here Client echo Your Server Name Here Client echo Made by Your Name Here JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Change it To this

@ECHO OFF color 81 title Your Server Name Here Client start http://YourWebsite.Com" echo Your Server Name Here Client echo Made by Your Name Here JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

By Owner Kevin And This Topic http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,396492.0.html
